page.title: 04Shops in Burford
page.content: Burford has a range of shops including a high proportion of antique and gift shops which attract visitors.Of the two grocers' shops, the Co-op employs four assistants and obtains its stock from its own distributors, ordering five weeks in advance. The dispensing chemist's shop has been a family business in Burford for sixty-seven years. The three assistants sell films, cameras and toiletries.They find soaps are their most popular line. Hussey's is a more specialised business selling wine to two hundred customers. They get their stocks from Continental countries. At the Bakery, where the bread is baked on the premises, sandwich and wholemeal loaves are most popular with customers.
